name: e-commerce-template-v1
description: <!-- Improved compatibility of back to top link: See: https://github.com/othneildrew/Best-README-Template/pull/73 -->

scripts.install-all: cd frontend && npm install && echo REACT_APP_BASE_URL='your-server-url' >> .env && echo REACT_APP_STRIPE_PUBLIC_KEY='your-stripe-public-key' >> .env && echo NODE_ENV='development' >> .env && cd ../backend && npm install && echo PORT='your-port-number' >> .env && echo DATABASE_URI='your-mongoDB-database-url' >> .env && echo JWT_SECRET='your-jwt-secret' >> .env && echo PASS_SEC='your-password-secret' >> .env && echo STRIPE_SECRET_KEY='your-stripe-secret-key' >> .env && echo NODE_ENV='development' >> .env && cd ..

author: Louis Brent
